title: HPI Spencer
content: The patient reports doing well with her thumb but notes that her right ring finger trigger finger has recurred. Symptoms began around 2020, and she had previously received 3 injections, which were not effective.

title: Musculoskeletal
content: Mild tenderness to palpation of the thumb CMC joints. Triggering at the right ring finger with tenderness at the right ring finger pulley.

title: Plan
content: Recommend surgical release after discussing risks. Continue night lifting.
